content: this is a beginner friendly pattern it is a simple and quick knit that will look nice on anyone you may choose to knit with one color or you can knit with multiple colors for a different look comes with instructions for a folded brim or no brim you can also choose to make the hat fitted or slouchy comes in 5 sizes from infant to adult large the pattern can be done with any bulky weight yarn i am always available if you have any questions happy knitting <3 -kari link to my youtube channel knitting tutorials 1 1 https //www youtube com/channel/uc7zq8hfi_c7vcggfsy0mg5a/videos
